United States Court of Appeals
                      For the First Circuit
                       ____________________

                           No. 01-2133

                       LARKIN D. WATSON IV,
                       Plaintiff, Appellant,


                                v.

    DEACONESS WALTHAM HOSPITAL, CAREGROUP, INC., LIBERTY LIFE
                     ASSURANCE CO. OF BOSTON,

                      Defendants, Appellees.
                       ____________________


                           ERRATA SHEET

          The opinion of this court, issued August 8, 2002,
should be amended as follows:

p 3, line 16:     remove "at" before ยง
p 6, last line:   insert comma after "1999"
p 10, line 22:    insert period after "Cir"

p 16, n.12, line 3: insert "[s]" after "make"

p 23, last line: delete "r" in "3rd"
